text: Mu by’ukuri, mu kuremwa kw’ibirere n’isi, kubisikana kw’ijoro n’amanywa, amato agenda mu nyanja mu bifitiye abantu akamaro, amazi (imvura) Allah amanura mu kirere nuko akayahesha isi ubuzima nyuma yo gupfa (gukakara) kwayo, akanayikwizamo inyamaswa z’amoko yose, n’ihindagurika ry’imiyaga n’ibicu bigenzwa hagati y’ikirere n’isi; rwose ibyo ubumwe ni ibimenyetso bw’Imana, (bigaragaza ubushobozi n’ingabire byayo) ku bantu bafite ubwenge
